The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 17 August is 275,834 (490 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 13 August, there were 6,525 new confirmed cases (11.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 06 August, there were 5,345 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 22% (1180 extra cases).
